HH24":"MI":"SS') REV_DT , SPACE_ROOM_NO, SPACE_NO, SPACE_NM , SPACE_IMG_PATH, SPACE_IMG_NM FROM REVIEW LEFT JOIN RESERVE USING(RES_NO) LEFT JOIN SPACE_ROOM USING(SPACE_ROOM_NO) LEFT JOIN SPACE USING(SPACE_NO) LEFT JOIN SPACE_IMG USING(SPACE_NO) ORDER BY REV_DT DESC
